about_the_game:
This is a 3D multiplayer cartoon-style tower defense game. Players control characters to walk on an island, build towers to protect castles, work together or hinder each other. Players can edit and share levels, and support making and uploading their own cell, building, and monster mods.

Hexagonal Cell

The island is composed of hexagonal cells. Cells have different functions. Characters can consume resources to change cells. Cells also affect the monsters' forward routes.

Monster and Tower Defense

Players can plan resources to build buildings. Buildings have their own functions to help resist monsters and affect the monsters' pathfinding methods. Monsters attack castles along cells. Various monster attack methods also put higher requirements on the deployment of tower defense.

Characters

Players can choose their own characters before starting game, and can control their characters to release skills to affect the battle situation.

Player cooperation and confrontation

The game has single-player and multiplayer modes. In multiplayer mode, players will face monster attacks at the same time and set the game goals for this game. Players can fight or cooperate with each other and use various strategies to win.

Level Editor

The game has a built-in level editor, which can import and export levels made by yourself or others.

Module Support

Support mods such as cells, buildings, monsters, etc. You can expand the game content you are interested in by yourself.
